briefTitle: Open-label Study to Assess the Effectiveness of Pirfenidone in Participants With Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis (IPF).
officialTitle: Local Open-label Multicenter Study to Assess the Effectiveness of Pirfenidone in Patients With Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis in Russian Clinical Practice
summary: This study is a national, multicenter, interventional, non-randomized, non-controlled, open-label study to assess the effectiveness of pirfenidone in participants with IPF in Russian clinical practice.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 26 in Absolute Millilitre (mL) Forced Vital Capacity (FVC)
